Answer rounded down since you cannot physically possess parts of individual fruits! Thus, Eve removed approximately 700,995 pomelos from her holdings if round up numbers aren’t used when handling physical objects like food items.

Original count minus remaining equals gifted count:    
\( 6,996,082 - 1,749,020 = 5,247,062 \)
